video.title: Luis Miguel - The Series
video.synopsis: This series dramatizes the life story of Mexican superstar singer Luis Miguel, who has captivated audiences in Latin America and beyond for decades.

episodes.synopsis: In 1981, Luis Miguel's father, a struggling musician, puts him onstage to perform for the first time. Six years later, tension builds between the two.
episodes.title: Cuando calienta el sol

episodes.synopsis: As the press get wind of Luis Miguel's talk with Hugo, his dad tries to get him a duet with Michael Jackson. Flashbacks recall Luis Miguel's TV debut.
episodes.title: La malagueña

episodes.synopsis: Luis Miguel begs his record label to let him try a new pop sound, and celebrates his 18th birthday. Back in 1981, Luisito Rey asks too much of Marcela.
episodes.title: Yo que no vivo sin tí

episodes.synopsis: Jealousy threatens to destroy Luis Miguel and Mariana's relationship. Alex feels betrayed by his brother after finding a postcard from their mother.
episodes.title: Culpable o no

episodes.synopsis: Luis Miguel's hard-partying ways end up putting an infatuated fan in serious danger. Financial issues call into question his dad's business practices.
episodes.title: La chica del bikini azul

episodes.synopsis: The singer endures basic training at a military college in order to film there, and learns about responsibility. Alex searches for their mom in Italy.
episodes.title: Mamá, Mamá

episodes.synopsis: In the midst of financial troubles because of his father, Luis Miguel travels to Italy to help Alex search for their mother and discovers several lies.
episodes.title: La incondicional

episodes.synopsis: Luisito Rey starts a new record label. While trying to determine what to do about his owed taxes, Luis Miguel travels to Aspen with a frustrated Alex.
episodes.title: Alguien como tú

episodes.synopsis: An investigator looks into Marcela's disappearance. Luis Miguel grows frustrated with reporters' questions about his father, who debuts a new singer.
episodes.title: Todo el amor del mundo

episodes.synopsis: After a breakthrough in the search for his mother, Luis Miguel must decide how to proceed. In 1985, tensions run high during a family reunion in Italy.
episodes.title: Decídete

episodes.synopsis: A financially destitute Luisito Rey begins running out of options. Érika and Fede argue over Luis Miguel. In 1986, Marcela gets serenaded onstage.
episodes.title: Marcela

episodes.synopsis: The truth about Luis Miguel's birthplace threatens to destroy his career just as he's trying to release a new album of classic Mexican songs.
episodes.title: No me platiques más

episodes.synopsis: As his father's medical condition worsens, Luis Miguel grows desperate for what could be his last opportunity to find out what happened to his mother.
episodes.title: No me puedes dejar así

episodes.synopsis: In 1992, a desperate Luis Miguel goes to great lengths to discover the truth about his mother's disappearance while also fighting for custody of Sergio.
episodes.title: Qué nivel de mujer

episodes.synopsis: Luis Miguel is delivered devastating news about his health in 2005. Years earlier, Hugo advises the singer not to be consumed by his search for Marcela.
episodes.title: Noche de paz

episodes.synopsis: Micky's competitive jealousy threatens to upend his relationship with his family. Many years later, he hopes to make amends with his estranged daughter.
episodes.title: Suave

episodes.synopsis: Micky struggles to balance filming his "Ayer" music video with spending time with Michelle. In the future, the father-daughter duo faces new challenges.
episodes.title: Ayer

episodes.synopsis: The possibility of a duet with Frank Sinatra brings Luis Miguel to New York, but back home, tragedy strikes. In 2006, he attempts to sing again.
episodes.title: Come Fly With Me

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed by grief, Micky asks his feuding songwriters to join him in Acapulco. Patricio makes a calculated move. In 2006, Susana heads to Peru.
episodes.title: El día que me quieras

episodes.synopsis: Luis Miguel is conflicted about whether to believe Mauricio. Years before, the singer tried to deter Sergio from going pro too young. Érika moved in.
episodes.title: Todo y nada

episodes.synopsis: In 1994, Luis Miguel faces tough decisions involving many of his loved ones. While 2007 starts to feel more stable, a shock is around the corner.
episodes.title: Historia de amor

episodes.synopsis: In 1995, Micky attempts to woo Mariah Carey. Patricio takes financial risks. Years later, the singer struggles to overcome his demons.
episodes.title: Sueña

episodes.synopsis: Luis Miguel faces tough decisions amid a legal battle. In the past, Mauricio starts working for Micky just as Patricio handles a plagiarism claim.
episodes.title: Cómo es posible que a mi lado

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio hopes to repair the relationship between Micky and his daughter. In the 90s, with Mariah's help, the singer is offered a chance to play Zorro.
episodes.title: Por debajo de la mesa

episodes.synopsis: Amid personal struggles, Luis Miguel contemplates making a movie about his life. Years earlier, Micky's jealousy creates conflict with Mariah.
episodes.title: Sabor a mí

episodes.synopsis: Mariah and Micky's relationship is on the rocks as they record a duet together. Decades later, Micky tells filmmakers anecdotes about his parents.
episodes.title: Amante del amor

episodes.synopsis: After Patricio deceives him, Luis Miguel retaliates. Flashing forward, Micky prepares for a comeback concert and finally reaches out to his daughter.
episodes.title: La Bikina
